NewList(address,string).details: Emitted when a new Curate contract is deployed using this factory. TODO: change TCR mentions.

params._address: The address of the newly deployed Curate contract.
params._listMetadata: A link to registry / list metadata (title,description) using its URI

params._curate: Address of the Curate contract that is going to be used for each new deployment.

returns._0: The number of deployed Curate contracts using this factory.

params._arbitrator: Arbitrator to resolve potential disputes. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.
params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the trusted arbitrator contract.
params._baseDeposits: The base deposits for requests/challenges as follows: - The base deposit to submit an item. - The base deposit to remove an item. - The base deposit to challenge a submission. - The base deposit to challenge a removal request.
params._challengePeriodDuration: The time in seconds parties have to challenge a request.
params._connectedList: The address of the Curate contract that stores related Curate addresses. This parameter can be left empty.
params._evidenceModule: The evidence contract for the arbitrator.
params._governor: The trusted governor of this contract.
params._listMetadata: A link to registry / list metadata (title,description) using its URI
params._relayerContract: The address of the relay contract to add/remove items directly.
params._templateRegistryParams: The dispute template registry. - templateRegistry : The dispute template registry. - registrationTemplateParameters : Template and data mappings json for registration requests. - removalTemplateParameters : Template and data mappings json for removal requests.

devdoc.title: CurateFactory This contract acts as a registry for Curate instances.
